subject: Re: [junit] gui testing
msgSnippet: On 6/11/02 2:44 AM, sudipto  chattopadhyay  ... Sure. But first you have to decide which aspect(s) of the gui you want to test.
messageBody:
On 6/11/02 2:44 AM, "sudipto chattopadhyay" <c_sudipto2002@...>
wrote:

> is there any way to test gui components using junit. if possible
> then how can i do? anyone can suggest about this?
> Sudipto

Sure. But first you have to decide which aspect(s) of the gui you want to
test. For many people, making the gui so stupid that it can't possibly break
and having it delegate to a class that can be unit tested, is sufficient.
